attributes.action: Hold a criminal investigation into the last governments criminal mishandling of the economy
attributes.additional_details: It is agreed by many MPs and the people of the UK, that Labour's handling of the British economy was 'Criminal', indeed MPs from both sides of the coalition agree. I want the government to setup an investigation into the way Labour handled the British economy, and for those whose actions are found to be 'reckless or negligent' to be brought to book; just as the banks and heads of banks have been.
